entities.name: tentacula
entities.description: Tentacula is mentioned as a plant that the Death Eaters are fighting. It is described as 'Devil's Snare'.

entities.name: devil's snare
entities.description: Devil's Snare is mentioned as a plant that the Death Eaters are fighting. It is also referred to as Tentacula.

entities.name: snargaluﬀ pod
entities.description: Snargaluﬀ pod is mentioned as an object that the Death Eaters are fighting.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who are fighting Tentacula, Devil's Snare, and Snargaluﬀ pod.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is the Charms master who is helping Harry Potter. He is able to cast complex spells from a distance.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story. He is concerned about the location of the diadem of Ravenclaw and asks Flitwick for help.

entities.name: diadem of ravenclaw
entities.description: The diadem of Ravenclaw is an object that Harry Potter is looking for. It is mentioned as being valuable but not useful in the current situation.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters are fighting Tentacula, Devil's Snare, and Snargaluﬀ pod.
Flitwick is helping Harry Potter by casting complex spells from a distance.
Harry Potter is looking for the diadem of Ravenclaw.
